result.problem: Although some of them are a little ______, basically they're pretty simple.
result.chn: 虽然它们中的有些有点模糊，但事实上，它们非常简单。(SpeakingMax英语口语达人 : 经常犯的失误)

result.problem: Under the ______ pact, the government agreed to the cleric's main demand of imposing Islamic law in the insurgency-hit districts.
We know what to do to prevent infections and save or ______ lives.
result.chn: 我们知道该怎么去做，来预防感染并且拯救或者延长生命。()

result.problem: And in this battle contentious battle ______ the public will lose,".
They showed the faces of people in a land that still wore the ______ of defeat in America's Civil War.
There are ______ controversies about it, and many of the courses you would take in law school are meant to try to get to the bottom of these thorny questions.
result.chn: 这个问题有很多争议，法学院的很多课都旨在,把这些棘手的问题弄得水落石出。(文学理论导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: "The strength of this relationship between obesity and inflammation is concerning, that something's happening that could be ______."

In some cases, people can ______ the information being represented but need a machine to use it properly.
result.chn: 在一些情况下，人们可以解释所表达的信息但是需要机器正确地使用它们。()

result.problem: During that unexpected rendezvous, I felt more in tune with the rhythms of life on this ______ planet than I ever have.
result.chn: 在那次意外的聚会中，在这个浩瀚的行星上，我前所未有地感觉到了与生命的节奏是如此地协调。()

result.problem: We thought that the Taliban will be reduced to a minor ______ factor within 6 months to a year.
result.chn: 我们原以为,在六个月到一年之内塔利班分子会减少成为一个很小的势利。(国际座谈会课程节选 : 普林斯顿公开课)

result.problem: What place can it occupy in each type of discourse, what ______ can it assume, and by obeying what rules?"
result.chn: 它可以在每种话语中占据什么样的位置，它在遵循什么原则的情况下可以有什么样的功能？“(文学理论导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: One tough moment Bradley was asked to ______ on was the loss to Costa Rica earlier in the week.
